definition[0]: the part or surface of something that is furthest from the centre
example[0]: The outside of the house was painted white.
definition[1]: the area around something such as a building, vehicle etc
example[1]: From the outside, it looked like any other big warehouse.
definition[2]: someone who is on or from the outside is not involved in an activity or does not belong to a particular group, organization etc
example[2]: Influences from the outside can undermine the values you want to teach your children.
example[3]: To anyone on the outside, our marriage seemed perfect.
